turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, my name is Sally Shultz and my phone number is 717-485-5555. I'm calling to place a pizza order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi Sally, is there any specific pizza shop you'd like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order from Brothers Pizzeria 1426 N 3rd St, Harrisburg, PA 17102 (717) 234 - 8300

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, Sally thank you for that information.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You are welcome, I really love the pizza from Brothers so I wanted to make sure to get it there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, is there any special type of pizza that you would prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I wanted a specialty Hawaiin pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, just the usual and what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted an extra large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, that sounds easy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, but I wanted to change one of the toppings. Instead of ham, I wanted sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, that sounds like an easy substitute.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want a sausage and pineapple pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, let me check to make sure it's available in that pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, that sounds great. Will you send a confirmation?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I will order it online and send a confirmation when the order is placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, Sally, this is a confirmation that your pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's been my pleasure Sally, have a good one.

items.name: this is a confirmation that your pizza order is complete
